Description: Jerk limitation of the motion profile for velocity.0 / Off /oFF: Off1 / 1 /1: 1 ms2 / 2 /2: 2 ms4 / 4 /4: 4 ms8 / 8 /8: 8 ms16 / 16 /16: 16 ms32 / 32 /32: 32 ms64 / 64 /64: 64 ms128 / 128 /128: 128 msAdjustments can only be made if the operatingmode is inactive (x_end=1).Modified settings become active the next time themotor moves.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3006:DhModbus 1562Profibus 1562CIP 106.1.13ModbusTCP 1562EtherCAT 3006:DhPROFINET 1562
